product_name: Boardworks Super Natural Stand Up Paddleboard - 10' 6"
long_description: Built for flatwater and surf, the Boardworks Super Natural stand up paddleboard connects you to the calming experience of being on the water thanks to its stable design and high-quality construction.
short_description: Built for flatwater and surf, the Boardworks Super Natural stand up paddleboard connects you to the calming experience of being on the water thanks to its stable design and high-quality construction.
